channel.title: Home on Taha Biyikli
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Taha Biyikli

item.title: About
item.description: Hey, I’m Taha, a freshman at Carnegie Mellon University majoring in Computer Science. I have a deep passion for cybersecurity, with a focus on application security, penetration testing, and low-level security like reverse engineering and binary exploitation. I’ve had the chance to play CTFs with MMM/PPP internationally and NEDİM KURU in Turkey. A few years back, I responsibly disclosed vulnerabilities to over 30 organizations, including Apple and the U.S. Department of Defense.
